actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a highway demonstration project for construction of a bridge to replace a bridge in providing motor vehicle access across the White River at DeValls Bluff, Arkansas.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a construction project to replace a bridge providing motor vehicle access across the White River at DeValls Bluff, Arkansas, to demonstrate motor vehicle and bridge safety and traffic flow benefits of a bridge replacement highway project. Authorizes appropriations out of the Highway Trust Fund for FY 1992. Specifies that the Federal share of the cost of the project shall be 100 percent.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a highway demonstration project for construction of a bridge to replace a bridge in providing motor vehicle access across the White River at DeValls Bluff, Arkansas.
